channel.title: What about OP: S and BS: S?
channel.description: First off all, I'm not talking about a total conversion. Like HL: S, is it possible to convert original BS and OP files to Source Engine?

item.title: What about OP: S and BS: S?
item.dc:creator: qabRieL
item.description:
Nerdguy:

No point of doing that only for ragdoll physics and better effects
Thats why there are total conversion mods

Well, I asked it because I wanted to add subtitles (and probably translation to my language).

Read full topic
